mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_member (member_id, member_password, member_name, member_phone, member_nickname, member_address, profile_image) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberName}, #{memberPhone}, #{memberNickname}, #{memberAddress}, #{profileImage})
mapper.select: SELECT member_id, member_password, member_name, member_phone, member_nickname, member_address, profile_image FROM tb_member WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
SELECT member_id, member_name, auto_date FROM tb_member WHERE session_id = #{sessionId}
